title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 341.4 - Member institutions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 341.4 - Member institutions

State Regulations

Each campus of the State University shall be a member
institution according to the following: the graduate division at each of the
doctoral degree granting institutions; the undergraduate division at each of
the doctoral degree granting institutions; each of the other State-operated
campuses; each community college; New York State College of Ceramics at Alfred

University; and one from the four statutory colleges at Cornell

University. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
341.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
